content.detailedDescription:
They were hoveringg up and down and spinning very fast--enought to leave trails of light.  they were shooting across the sky, but there was no sound.  they would send beams to each other.  they were spinning and hovering at the same time.  there was a green light illuminating off the top of one of them.  it looked like a fireball because the whole thing was illuminating.  one of the other ones was changing color from blue to white to green, but it was still spinning and hovering.  would stop illuminating and show a bright white light, then the entire thing would illuminate again.

i just arrived home from work and my boyfriend showed them to me.

nick was outside looking up at the sky while waiting for me to get home.

i was excited at the possibility of other being examining the things we do  i felt like i was on x-files.  i felt anxious.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At least 10 seen

content.detailedDescription: We left milpitas around 7:40pm on our way to sacramento. we were driving on interstate 680 north. as we were passing dublin we noticed a strange object in the sky that had multiple lights rotating around on what seems to be a disc. what caught my attention were these lights. it was evident that we were not the only ones that noticed it because drivers were swirving and pressing thier brakes to witness the object. there were a number of cars that pulled over and some were even taking pictures. when i first seen the object i thought it was a blimp because it was hovering and moving slowly. but i have never seen a blimp with lights around it in that fashion. the rotations of the lights were irratic and did not have a pattern. they were yellow and bright. directly above the rotating lights was a single white light situated in the middle. after about 20 minutes of hovering the object began to move away in a quick manner. i noticed that the object then made an abrupt move downward in an angle as if it was going to land. the object did not land but was relatively lower in altitude than when first seen. after a couple minutes the object shot across the sky in a zip zag manner at the speed of a shooting star till it can not be seen. after this event my girlfriend an i were amazed at what we had just witnessed. we are now firm believers of ufos.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc like object hovering with lights rotating along bottom

content.detailedDescription: I took the dog out for the last time tonite.I was looking at polaris and out of nowhere saw what appeared to me to be a light streaking across the sky from south to north.It was definately faster than a plane.It was brighter than any shooting star i've ever seen.And it was also slower than any shooting star i've seen.I was standing on the deck in front of my house and it was nne at approx. a 45-50 deg angle.My first thought was of videos of the apollo or shuttle spacecraft returning.My second thought was how much it looked like a rocket going through the sky.I saw no signs of a contrail of any kind.
content.summary: Sighting of unknown object

content.detailedDescription: My neighbors and i witnessed a ufo tonight.  3 people watched as a medium sized metalic blue and silver object floated silently past our apartment.  i did not see the beginning of the sighting, but was drawn outside by their excitement and watched as the strangest thing i'd ever seen floated past.  two neighbors drew sketches of what they ...And i got pictures of the object.  there was no sound.  the sighting lasted 15 minutes.  i only saw the last 5 minutes.  by the time i came outside the object had passed...But i got a quick look at it before i ran inside and got my camera.  i have a 12 power optical zoom on my digital camera and i was able to zoom in and get several pictures.  i wish i'd been there and saw what they saw from the beginning.  it had shining lights.  the kids were outside playing and it came out of nowhere.  tony looked up and saw something very strange and asked debbie what it was.  debbie had no idea.  her husband leonard, who is a retired air force jet mechanic also had no idea what the object might be.  there was no noise, no smoke, no chemical trails, no vibration of any kind coming from the object.  it was very peaceful.  there was a clear window on the object but no beings were seen.  lights shined brightly and evenly and changed colors from white to red to blue to green to pink to red...And the last color was a big bright orange.  at first they thought it might be a helicopter or a remote control plane or a glider because there was no motor.  the object was shaped like half of the yellow submarine from the beatles...With a window on the front and a metal rod coming out of the bottom.  it was silver and metalic bright blue.  my neighbor debbie had been talking about ufos just before the sighting occured.  it floated evenly with a constant speed in a straight line.  we all felt very peaceful during the sighting, and were all shocked and in utter awe,  we'd never seen anything like it in our lives.  the object floated way off into the distance until it was just a spot of flashing orange light and then it disappeared.
content.summary: Ufo witnessed near old colorado city 7pm 8 31 07 many witnesses, pictures, drawings

content.detailedDescription: Looking sse from our house about 6 miles south of sullivan and 6 miles east of findlay.  just over the treetops.  a glow appeared lasting approximately 5 seconds.  the glow was bigger than a star or plane lights.  it did not flash or grow or fade or move.  when it disappeared, another one immediately appeared a distance away from it -- more southward.  a delay of a few minutes, then another one appeared at a similar location, but not the exact location.  while it was similar to the glow of a fireworks, it did not arc or move in any way.  and it did not slowly appear or fade away.... rather it just appeared and disappeared.  both my husband and i saw these lights -- a total of about 7 or 8.  in addition, we saw a falling star to our east during this period of 10 minutes, along with fireworks several miles to our west.  we also saw what we assumed was a plane, except it's light did not pulsate and it appeared to bounce along -- not fly in a straight line like the other plane lights we observed at the same time.  this light was to our north moving westward.
content.summary: Flashes or glow of reddish orange lights

content.detailedDescription: At 11:oo p.M. on monday, august 27,2007, i stepped outside to take a look at the full moon. i was surprised to see so many white fluffy clouds still floating around, the moon was behind one of these clouds so i stood waiting. the moon was full and giving off a lot of light even though it was behind a cloud. i could see the white and blue lights of at least six airplanes at different heights. three going in a north direction and two going south. one a south west direction. then a beam of light shot through the sky from a very huge cloud,i couldn't see a structure just the beam and then a second one.The first beam lit on one of the planes going north then went directly to a second plane going north. the plane turned toward the west and the light beam went back to the other plane,which was pretty far away and had climbed very high, at this point it was hard to make out his lights. the beam of light then immediatly pulled off of that plane and went to a plane that was just barely south of winamac but climbing very high. the beam of light stayed on this plane untill a cloud passed over it, the plane now behind the cloud. i could no longer hear the plane as it had climbed too high, because of the cloud i couldn't see the plane. but the beam of light seemed to stay fixed behind the cloud. the light from this beam seemed to go out but left a trail of mist or vapor or something because after several minutes it began to break up and the light was gone. the thing that got me was the beam of light, when on the airplanes, wasn't shining past the planes.The second beam of light was coming from the same cloud but was shining toward the south and upward on another airplane that was out of my sight in just a couple of minutes because it seemed to be going straight up. the second beam stayed on that one airplane untill it to went out and left a trail of something misty like the first beam. these light beams came on at the same time and went out at the same time coming from the same cloud. i heard no sound from that cloud, it was huge.
content.summary: Beams of light

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, aunt and myself were driving over the causeway which connects the east side of town to the city center. i live south of the city center. as we were driving over the causeway, i happened to glance towards the area where my house was. i saw what i first thought to be an over sized balloon. once i took a second look, i noticed that it was cylinder shaped and was perfectly vertical. it looked either silver or maybe reflective. there were no noticeable markings, it looked pretty plain. from the distance, it did not look any taller that 30-35 feet in height. at this point in time it looked as though it was right over my house, about 1 km away. i owned a digital video recorder and asked my aunt who was driving at the time to hurry so that i could get home and film it. as i watched it as we crossed the causeway, it moved towards the south/east direction to another part of town call "redhead". the object looked as though it was only 100 feet above the houses at the time. this was my perspective from the causeway. i told my wive that it could not have been a balloon as i first thought because it did not "tumble and roll with the wind". i saw nothing hanging from it to make me think of it being any type of balloon and it stayed perfectly verticle as it moved towards redhead. i live near the end of the south end and there is water (bay of fundy?) which we have a ferry to take passengers to nova scotia. so, when i finally got back to the house, the object was still in view but looked as though it was either over the bay or over redhead. i ran up to the house and grabbed my digital camcorder. by the time i got back out side, i tried to zoom in on the object but like most sightings on film, the power lines which run up my street, made the camera hard to focus on the object. the auto focus kept focusing on the power lines.
by the time when i tried to get some video of it, it looked to be maybe a couple thousand feet away. it continued towards redhead and went higher into the clouds. i took what video i had and uploaded it to my computer i was only able to save one frame that had a half decent shot of the object. i ended up sending it to a few of my friends but they really could not make out what the object was. 

recently while at work, one of my clients was watching a show about ufo sightings. as i sat down with him, i could not believe that i saw the exact shaped object as i had seen a few years earlier. the picture was taken outside of canada. up until now i never talked about it to anyone except family and friends. i'm a very level headed person and even though i enjoy sci-fi and types of documentaries about ufo's, i was a bit of a sceptic up to the day that i actually saw one for myself. seeing the same object on tv convinced me that i was not hallucinating that afternoon.  

the photo attached is not the one i took but it looks exactly the same as i saw it. my first view was much closer. over the last couple years, my computer has been formated and any video i had back then has been lost.
content.summary: Noticed it on the way home clost to my house

content.detailedDescription: I was outside to watch lunar eclipse as soon as the moon completely disappeared.I decided to look and see how bright the stars were without the moonlight.I looked up a saw the orion belt.As soon as i looked down toward the tops of the trees i noticed these lights blinking .They were red ,white ,and blue.So at first i assumed they were an airplane but i noticed they weren't moving anywhere.But just sitting about a hundred feet above tree line.So i got my camera out that i had for the eclipse and started filming.The strange part about all this is for the whole time i was filming i could see it the entire time with my naked eye.But on the film it looks like it had disappeared and was changing shapes.Now this thing was about 150 yards from where i was standing.I filmed it for about 5 min's before my battery ran out on my camera which is also strange because i had only filmed with it maybe a total of 20 min's .And i had just taken it off the charger before we had gone outside so it was fully charged.It has always lasted about 3 hours before this time.Any ways we stayed outside a good hour and what ever it was just hovered over those trees.I didn't hear any noise.So thats about it i was tired we went inside and i emailed someone with mufon they told me to report it here so there you go.
content.summary: Saw ufo during eclipse on tuesday morning am have a film of event

content.detailedDescription: While i was watching t.V. i noticed a light out of the corner of my eye. when i turned to look out of the window which faces due west i noticed a light that started as quite dim then brightened almost like an airplane landing light then gradually disappear. it was approximately 3 times the height of the mountains which are about 70 miles away. at first i assumed that it was an airplane but it did not move. i went outside and watched for approximately another 5 minutes but it did not return. there were no airplanes or stars in the vicinity. total time was approximately 8 - 10 seconds.
content.summary: Very bright stationary light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was using my night vision, looking up into the sky at 11:10 pm, on 8/30/07, when from the north-west traveling to the south-east, for a duration of about 6 seconds, i saw either 5 ufos flying in a triangular attack formation or one large triangular craft traveling at an amazing speed overhead. 
these were 5 distinct lights only seen through my night vision monocular.  there was a lead light and the lights along the right side were perfectly symetrical with the two other lights along the right side; however, the two lights on the left side were not as symetrical, with one being seperated by an uneven distance between the lead light and the trailing left hand 3rd light on the left side. light #2 on the left hand side was uneven with the rest, but over all......These 5 lights were traveling in a perfect open triangular formation before dissapearing out of sight.
the speed must have been in excess of 6000 to 10,000 miles per hour, very very fast, and the altitude must have been much greater than 50,000 feet.  
as they traveled past background stars, the stars did not become obstructed as if it was one single craft, which convinced me that they were 5 distinct individul crafts flying in attack formation, your standard triangular formation.
will be watching the skys more often now with night vision.
content.summary: Private detective saw 1 high flying triangle or 5 seperate ufos flying in triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: We were making sno on the ski runs when one of the guys noticed the object hovering above the valley it was very large ..Maybe 200 or 300 ft or more across. it was about 500 ft or so above the valley ...But almost sraight out from our crew as we were close to the top of the mountain at the time. it seemed like it was watching us make snow maybe..It was huge.. it looked like a stadium or sumthing floating there unbelievable in size. it had pulsating lights all around the outer edge and they lit up one at a time all the way around the thing ...But the srangest thing was every once in a while the lights would go out and then you could see the stars where it had been...Like it had just disapered .Then poof the lights would come back on and it was there again ..You could clearly see it...We were all grown men not  afraid of much ...Used to working somtimes alone at night but once we started watching this thing all work stopped leaving the snow guns running we all watched it in amazment for about two hours.As tom drove me back to our cars i made him stop yelling look look it was slowly tilting until it was sidways in the air.When our shift ended the next crew came on and they said they watched it for several more hours.  i was with the crew boss at the time. tom...Tom was a very large man and not afraid of anything and tough as nails  who was not afraid to speak his mind  but also a very nice fellow who would give you the shirt off his back if you needed it. he still lives there with his family and i see him somtimes.After that night we rarely spoke of it it had shaken all of us and as for myself it took all these years to finaly tell my story.All of us are still within 100 miles or so of the sighting. i will never forget that night and am a firm believer that we are not alone.I chose to keep this story short and just tell the basic facts.But to this day when im out at night its scary for me and i am allways on my guard.
content.summary: We were making snow on lutsen mntns ski runs when we noticed a large really large object hovering above moose valley it was ringed by lights and several people including myself watched in amazment

content.detailedDescription: My friend & i were traveling north on i5 near ferndale. i was looking at a southbound jet w/chem-trail & thought, "with all the reports of ufos checking this out, wouldn't it be funny.." and there one was! i witnessed it for roughly a minute. it was traveling slowly to the west. all of the sudden, it phased out of sight. it was a clear day. no cloulds & very bright.
content.summary: Ufo examining jet chem-trail, disappears from plain sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was up tuesday morning filming the lunar eclipse when an object floated in from the right to the left on the lit part of the moon.  the object was as wide as the moon, it stopped in the middle and started moving to the top.  it stayed in front of the moon for at least a minute before it started to disappear up into the darkness.  it was large and oddly shaped.  the outer part of the unidentified object reached to both sides of the moon.  have it all on video.
content.summary: Videotaped unidentified object floating in front of the moon during the lunar eclipse.

content.detailedDescription: I was over my grandmothers house and i was sitting on the back deck relaxing. it was dark out side but the lights from the city were illuminating the sky some what. i was looking up at the sky and i saw a blinking red dot fly across the sky the craft was a triangle shape. it was a very deafining roar with pulses. the house and the ground started to shake intensly. the car alarm on my h3 went off with out a problem and it takes something for that to go off. because when i went to the airshow by me and a b-1 flew over and that wasn't nearly not even close to how loud that unidentified aircraft was.
content.summary: I think this was the aurora.

content.detailedDescription:
This may sound odd but i'm watching a show about ufo's on the history chanel from the 1970's and this reminded me of the event. there were 3 primary witnesses and 2 secondary witnesses. the primary were: robert garner, william grifith and myself. secondary witnesses were rob kaydo and georgia lloyd.

the primary witnesses were shooting bats which were flying around a street light which illuminated our yard. our house was located on state road about 1/8 mile north of boughner road in trumbull township south of geneva ohio. we were standing in the driveway under the street light talking when i looked up and noticed a stationary round object hovering aproximately 2000' above us. i would guess the object was 50'-75' in diameter. it was white luminous similar to the street light but not casting light onto the ground. we watched the object for a short time and mr. kaydo who was walking down the road overheard our conversation and also noticed the object. i called to georgia lloyd (my mother) to come out and see what was hovering. she ignored my calls several times before walking out through the covered porch to where she could see the object. the object began to move due north when i first called for georgia to come out of the house. there was no noise and no noticable vapor trail. by the time georgia got outside the house (approximate walking distance 20' the object was barely visable.

i would estimate the object accelerated beyond 1000m/h in a smooth rapid motion. a very interesting event followed, what appeared to be two f-4 phantoms came from the southwest and took the same northbound flightpath the object took. afterburners were clearly visible in the night sky when they flew over. i am an avid fan of aircraft and wanted to be a pilot when i was in highschool. poor vision kept me out of rotc.

the dates are guesses and the year was either 1977 or 1978 as i didn't yet have my drivers license. the night was brisk and the sky clear. i have no idea how long the object hovered over us before we noticed it. it remained stationary for some time and appeared to be observing us. if you can check records from any local airforce bases from this timeframe you might be able to zero in on the exact date, that is if the flight records are available.

i don't believe the object was man-made. the acceleration rate was too great and the object was totally silent. the 2 airforce jets that flew over were definitely not silent! we were somewhat spooked by the event but i would say curiosity was the primary feeling at the time and still is.
content.summary: Light hovered over our yard, moved off due north, 2 military jets followed within minutes with afterburners

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine lives in the san francisco bay area. while she slept, i knew she would miss the opportunity to see the eclipse of the moon. i live in las vegas and already saw it early yesterday morning. i connect to many bay area and other webcams, so i thought i would check some to see if any had a picture of the bay area skyline with perhaps the eclipsed moon.  what i saw was no moon. it was cigar shaped, and very bright.  it moved in each frame snap from right to left, then back to center, close to the camera. the webcam refreshes every 2 minutes (the date/time is super imposed on the screen at the cam source http://www.Rntl.Net/images/sausalitocam.Jpg ) difficult to see in the dark water, but shows the event from 3:06 am pdt to 3:15 am then the final frame shows nothing again. in daytime views of this cam, you can see no physical structure reach that height.
i've enclosed a stiched together copy of each of the snaps in sequence. i have done no other alteration to the images. fortunately they are of high resolution amongst webcams. i wrote cbs5 immediately in the bay area on a form simular to this, with no way to send the pictures. i thought if they had reports, they might be able to use them. i have gotten no reply. i also wrote with the pictures, local klas-tv news investigator and part time host to coast to coast am, george knapp, and he urged i write you with the photos. we're both curious. also, i hope that above i set it to the right time zone. sometimes phoenix is the same time as vegas, and other times they are not as the don't switch to daylight savings time, i believe. it may be nothing important, but it is definitely unusual.
the pictures say more and they are enclosed. thank-you.
content.summary: Screencaps enclosed

content.detailedDescription:
while on guard at an entry control point in baghdad, some lights where noticed doing unusual things over the greenzone. myself and a number of other soldiers witnessed the event from our post on the 14th july bridge.
the bridge is a checkpoint which screens traffic and personnel comming into the greenzone from the southern bank of of the tigris.
 air traffic is constantly present in the area of the sighting. at any given time one can expect to see various types of helicopters, flares, even rockets and mortars, along with the usual tracer fire. i am well familiar with all aspects of these occurances and there appearance.
 as the pace of work on a checkpoint is quit busy, when i first noticed the object i dismissed it instantly. due to the set up of the control point we were facing south into the city for security purposes, having the allready secure greenzone on our back to the north. it looked alot like a flare at first.
 a flare can come in many types, the type that this craft most resembled was a parachute illumination flare. this type of flare is quite brite and can hang in the air for up to a couple minutes. typically such devices are luanched via artillary. norally the flare will appear simingly from now where and then gently desend under the drag of its parachute, finnaly dimming out into nothing. close up a parachute can be seen as well as smoke and the noticable downward and side to side movement. farther away these effects are less and less noticable.
 when i first saw it i was simply turning around to do something and noticed it at about 800 meters out and 200 feet up, directly over a traffic circle in the greenzone. i turned back around and went back to searching vehicles. about a half hour later i was relieved so that i could eat. i walked back away from the search area to a bunker which was a little removed from the action but still on the bridge. as i dug in to eat i looked up to see the same type of light hovering over the greenzone. it appeared to be in more or less the same position as earlier.
 this is when i began to think it strange. a flare would have distinguished its flame long ago. besides at this distance now that i was paying attention i could see it was definately not a flare, or a rocket, or a helicopter, or an airplane. it sat there fixed totally still and silent. i noticed that if i moved from one side of the bridge to the other my perspective changed. it definately had a fixed point in the sky, not to far away. it was at first a pinkish orange in appearance and looked from what i could tell to be the size of a 5o gal. drum. it was completely spherical and seemed to have a sort of illuminated gas collecting around it. as i watched the thing it slowly started to transform.
 i got the attention of my nco and asked him what he thought of it. he stated matter of factly that he didn't know. we had all seen some crazy shit thus far and evidently he wasn't all that impressed by this either.
he dismissed it much as i had when i first saw it. as he went about his business i continued to watch the thing. the pinkish haze that enveloped the orange ball of light started slowly to take on a brighter hugh. it was as if it was condensing. the center of it seemed to get brighter as well. now i could see clearly the thing was changing.
 as the hazy shroud began to disapear completely the ball went from orange
to a deep and ominous tone of red, all the while it seemed to shrink in size. ultimately having about the size and shape of a basketball. this was something i had never seen before. something very strange happened as it was doing this too. just as it was about to turn completely from a gasy orange pinkish color into a deep red, it started to woble slightly. it was completely motionless up until this point, as if it were set in stone. but now as it began to wobble the city lights in the area flickered, this of course is totally normal for baghdads broken electrical infrasructure. however the wierd part is our gas generated flood light we use to light up the search area flickered too.
 again i called my squad leader.
"hey, now look at it, its moving!"
as it floated to the west the lights of the buildings beneath it actually got slightly brighter.
my squad leader walked over to a hum-v and got out the hand mic. he was calling up the activity to or command. his exact words were, "theres a ufo in the greenzone" he was asked if he had enough sleep and if aside from the ufo was everything under control. it was so that was the last we talked to higher about it.
 the light began to climb strait up, very slowly in a strait line, strait up. as it ascended i saw what looked like a couple of smaller white orb type things, which were brighter and higher up. they moved like a house fly would, in eratic and jerky movements, back and forth. then as the the red ball got to a hight of about 600 feet it just blinked out. this finally got a little reaction out of my squad leader.Thinking the show was over i went back to my position to relieve the next guy to eat. after the shift we all went back to our compound.

while getting ready to rack out at almost three in the morning we gathered a few of us around a table to smoke ciggarettes and burn of the days anxiety. not everyone saw the thing, some of the newer guys thought we had made it up to fuck with them. all together only 5 people i know of saw it, myself included. each of us saw pretty much the same thing. some saw similar activity at differnt times of the night, but we all agreed it was the same thing. the soldier who sat down to eat after me said he saw it cruise up and down the river only feet of the surface of the water. he said after a few minutes of bobbing around on near the water it stopped a minute and then just shot up like it was fired from a cannon only without any sound or arc to its trajectory.
 all the people who saw these things are experienced judges of distances and reliable witnesses, who have far better things to do than look for ufo's especially while in iraq. all of us are also very familliar with all known types of aircraft and pyrotechnics that one might mistake for a ufo. i believe what we saw that night was something not of this world checking up on the war in iraq. who knows mabey bush makes headlines on
planet x as well as here on earth.
content.summary: Observation of multiple luminous objects in secured area.

content.detailedDescription:
Thireteen year old ryan abney was walking early the morning of july 26, 2007 in nearby perkins park at about 7:20 a.M. and noticed a bright light in sky. he descibed the object that appeared as pinkish-yellow which he compared to the "bug lights on the bridge."  the object was round with a symbol that looked like a "w" on the bottom that blinked when the outter ring of object spun around. he descibed it as about 10' thick by 40' wide and just hovering about 100' to 200' above some trees. after hovering for app. 40 mins "it reared up and took off like a jet or rocket" he said.
    ryan did take a few pictures of the object on his cell phone which he showed to investigators. ryan also took us (this field investigator, state dir. and asst. state dir. his grandfater and sister) to the sight where the object appeared to him and while there he was asked how the object made him feel he said "a little scared." 
   later ryan and his sister sat in their family van while the rest of us talked about the  different sightings his grandfater has had in the past. while in the van with his sister ryan discovered he had also recorded the sound the objcet made when it took off that morning. he let us liste to it and and it was noticed that it sounded just like the sound your computer makes when a cetain function is performed.
   ryan also provided and a very detailed drawing of the object.
content.summary: Ryan abney was taking and early morning walk in nearby park when he noticed and bright light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My cousin sherry saw this i simply reporting it to you .I sent her a link to get on here .She has seen it two nights in a row
content.summary: Hovering with flashing lights and soaring straight up into space

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the 4th floor of an apartment building. i've made a habit of going out to the balcony at night just to view the stars, relax or watch airplanes flying over or just get fresh air. i live in an area where planes fly over all the time as they make their descent towards pearson international airport so i'm familiar with how a plane looks like and sounds like at night.

there were a few clouds in the sky and just like any ordinary night, i went out to the balcony to relax and watch this particularly bright star up in the northeast direction. then at 12:10 a.M., i saw someting at the left of the star and i thought it could just be another airplane. as it moved closer, i noticed that there were no lights pulsing / blinking anywhere it and it looked opaque and grayish white. despite some cloudcover, this thing stood out because the clouds appeared reddish due to light pollution. i waited for the typical jet sounds but there was none, it was silent.

this thing moved faster than most landing jets. the flying object is almost over me now that i have to tilt my head up. then i noticed that this object   looked oval and it seemed to be rotating in its axis that it looked liked it's triangular-oval. still no signs of lights or sounds from the object. then it made a swift and sharp turn to the left, got lightly obscured by clouds then it reappeared and hovered on one spot. it still looked liked it was rotating on it's axis. it hovered for several minutes then it moved slowly to the left and just simply vanished, not into the clouds but its just disppeared in a small clear patch of sky between the clouds. it was now 12:35 a.M.  

before i decided to report this, i thought of several things that i could closely identify the object with:

1. a jet or airplane - most jets have rhythmic blinking lights on their wings and tails. this thing however showed no lights or sound at all.

2. migratory birds - i do see some birds flying over sometimes and i could make out their wings flapping. the object i saw was solitary and it was rotating on it's axis and it hovered on one spot at one point.

3. kite or some wind-blown object - i ruled this out because it wasn't windy that night at all. the clouds were steady and any wind blown object could not hover and move across the sky all at the same time.

fast info:
aug. 27, 2007 (12:10 - 12:35 a.M.)

weather: calm with few clouds, stars still visible. clouds appeared reddish due to light pollution.

object sighted: north east near a bright star (capella?) just slightly lower from the constellation perseus.

object characteristic: opaque. grayish white, generally oval (a bit triangular), fast moving, spinning on axis and has the ability to hover and make sharp changes in direction. no lights or sound heard from object. 

object size: it looks like its in a fairly high altitude. i could cover it with my thumb.

note:
i've attached my illustration of the object in a "time-frame" manner.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo over toronto?

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my aunt were driving down  to sacremento form crescent city when about  10:00 pm we were passing threw  clear lake oaks going towards nice 
when i happened look arcoss towards  upper lake art colony when saw an usual object hoovering over the lake me and aunt pulled the carr over and watched the object for about 11-19 mintues  then it moved arcossed the lake and then it shot up into  the night sky  and dissapeared.
content.summary: A bright flahing light  green yellow red  blue white it kind of  hoovered for mintue then  proceeded to float arcoss the lake and shoot up into the night sky and  dissapear .

content.detailedDescription:
I don't know if this means anything but in 2007 jan 11 i claim it was about 7:00 when i look north and then i see these white circle flat looking orb blueish ufo's it had to be about 7-16 they were flying in formation as in a upside down triangle with the point facing east as if they were going back to israel becasue i live in florida and it's loacated east of florida.
man i am still not sure to the fullest if i really seen them, i had a earge to go outside and look for ufo's that day.
content.summary: They were in a formation as a triangle in a zig zag motion heading east .

content.detailedDescription:
First off, i'm really not sure of the exact date as it was a  long time ago. i was about 10 or 11 years old so it must have been 91 or 92. i believe it was fall because of the darkness and temperature. 

i was riding my bike during the night, my parents have left to go to town for a late dinner together. as i was riding, i saw a light off the road about a hundred yards away in a clearing of the woods. at first, i thought it was just leftover light in my eye from starring at the street lamp (you know, when you look at something bright then look away you can still see the shape of the light even though its gone). but as i moved my eyes around and blinked, i noticed the light stayed in one spot. as my eyes adjusted, i notices that the object was almost pulsing a bit and i began to see shadows that it was casting from all the trees. 

i curiously gazed at it for a few minutes. i decided to get a bit closer and the second i put my right foot on the pedal of my bike to move forward, the light immediately turned dark red. i was terrified. i remember thinking "my whole life i've wanted to see a ufo, now that i'm here seeing a ufo, i'd rather be anywhere else in the world but here". the worst part was, in order to get home, i had to ride closer to the ufo to get away from it. my options were miles and miles of crops, or ride past it on the road to get back home. i remember seeing through the trees as i rode past it. i have never ridden my bike this fast before. my adrenaline was pumping and i could hear nothing other than my own heartbeat. i stopped at the first house i saw with a light on and waited out front to see if i was being followed, a few minutes later i finished the final leg and made it home safely to lock all the windows and doors. as far as i know the object never moved. the next day i went back tot he location and i did see three circles about 6" in diameter in a perfect triangle on the exact location that the object was. but since i was just a kid and not many people in my family had experiences like this, my words and opinions were dismissed as a dream or over action.
content.summary: A circular shaped object hovering a few feet off the ground- whiteish green light. when alerted to my presence, it change color to dark red, and i ran.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down the highway when all of a sudden there was this flash, it was right out of bakersfield and into the grapevine. we had our car break down and while we were there this cigarette shaped thing flew over our heads slowly making a humming noise it stopped for about two secods 450ft or so above our heads so we saw it clearly and then it gained speed and it must have been going past mach 3 and left us within 7 seconds after we had seen it above us. when it sped off is when we saw the green light, before that we noticed it because of the flash but afterwards could only see it was a measly almost reflection glint of metal from the moon and some streetlights. we took pictures of this ufo and left our disposable camera in the car. we stayed at the travel lodge near the airport and the next morning when we woke up, our car with the camera had been stolen. coincednece or not we arent sure, but we ne3ver found our car, and nonetheless it proved to be a firghtening experience.
content.summary: Bright light with a light green tail

content.detailedDescription: During the lunar eclipse i wanted to photograph the event.  i got my camera and set up my tripod in front of my house.  night photography needs longer exposure times without camera movement.  i set the desired exposure and set the timer so i wouldn't shake the camera while taking the picture.  pressing the button and waiting 10 seconds for the camera to fire i would not be looking through the viewfinder.  this photo was the longest exposure of the night at 4 seconds.  you can see some of the movement of the stars with a small amount of streaking with a long exposure of 4 seconds.  this object has a very defined pattern of lights and some visible structure.
content.summary: Visible lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was car-camping overnight about 12 miles wsw of the dalles, oregon, at 2950' elev., 6.7 miles up ketchum road (accessed via chenoweth road) and not far from ketchum lake, on a breezy, clear night.  location had a few trees, but mostly unobstructed view in all directions.  sleep had been fitful due to the windy & exposed location. around 2 am pdt i rather suddenly woke up, opened my eyes looking up & out the adjacent window, and there it was (i.E., i looked directly at it upon opening my eyes),--- a pencil-shaped ufo with 2 rows (8-9 pairs) of dim whitish lights synmmetrically spaced along the length of the dark object.  typing repeated colons gives the idea of the lights, with the object itself 50% wider:  

                        :::::::::     ---> direction of motion, due north.

it was about 50 degrees above the western horizon, cruising at apparently medium speed due north, and had estimated arc-length between 30 min. (=lunar diameter) and 60 minutes.  diameter seemed about 1/10 to 1/12 of length. there were no visible head, tail, fins, wings, etc.; however i had a visual impression of ridges or nodes between each pair of lights.  typing colons separated by capital letter "i's" gives the idea,

                        :i:i:i:i:i:i:i:i:

but the nodes had less "tittle" (head & tail of the vertical "i") and were symmetrically placed, unlike this typing which shows the "i" taller than the colons.  while it's possible the nodes were a visual artifact, i'd vote 60/40 for objective vision.

its ~45 degree straight-line motion was close to due northward, roughly on a line (depending on altitude) from mt. hood to mt. adams, and carried it partway toward the nw horizon into an area of hazier night sky.  i lost sight of it then, after 5 seconds observation, and i'm unable to say whether it faded out in the haze or suddenly disappeared --- a tree blocked view momentarily.  i'm accustomed to aerial observation, have 20/20 vision, do not use any type of intoxicant, was instantly awake and alert for this observation, and have a long track record of rapid, accurate identification of flying birds, aircraft, etc.  i'm fairly confidant in my rough estimates of object and motion arc-length, relative length & breadth of object, duration of observation, and sky location of object.  estimate of altitude (2-10 miles) is much more of a guess and is the main variable in trigonometrically estimating length of object, velocity of motion, etc. the most conservative estimates yield an object length of 130' and velocity of 600 mph; the high end estimates give figures 10x greater.  but without someone else's observation from a different location (allowing triangulation, and correction of observer subjectivity), this is all rough guesswork.  

i've wondered if this could've been a jetliner with two rows of lighted fuselage windows visible; but such an aircraft would have to fly upside down, or more exactly, with myself directly dorsal to the plane, to make both rows of window lights visible.  most unlikely, and a conventional jet/rocket/propeller driven aircraft of that arclength would've made plenty of noise; and this object was utterly silent.  its wings would've blocked out starfields (whereas i only observed the pipe-shaped "fuselage" blocking out stars), & of course there were no navigation/running lights. 

i wrote down my observations in the minutes after sighting.  as this is the second ufo sighting in my life (3/1981 was the previous one), i was not worked up or excited by this event, but it sure grabbed my attention, and i reviewed my visual memories many times.  later in the night,i did have a brief but strange dream.  the rough trigonometry came a couple of days later.
content.summary: Pencil shaped ufo moving due north in straight line, in cloudless starry sky; 2  longitudinal rows of white lights (approx. 9 pairs);  noiseless.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work (working nights)unloading one of our paint booths i was looking at the sky (which i do from time to time) when i noticed this circle object in the sky. i thought it was a satellite moving across the sky so i kept my eye on it for about 10 secs when out of no where it took off so fast it turned into a flash of blueish green and then just dissapeared into the sky.
content.summary: Satellite looking object turned into a flash of blueish green and then dissapearing!

content.detailedDescription: As usual of a sunday evening i was spending time at my local pub (chequers inn,lytchett matravers. coordinates: 50���45'24"n 2���5'8"w  ). thanks to the new smoking ban in the uk, it was deemed necessary for me to venture outside for a ciggy. all alone, and gazing at the clear night sky the constellation of the plough caught my attention. it was at an angle of about 45 degrees to me, in a westerly direction. suddenly, from my right side i sensed a fast moving white luminous object running e-w at a tremendous velocity. it held a steady horizontal line, no idea at the height, but it was lower than the commercial flights that skirt the village at 300 feet. no sound, no tail. my first ever sighting, hopefully not my last.
content.summary: Bright white object moving horizontally at immense speed.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend an i were camping in the backyard in the west end of council bluffs,ia. i noticed an object high in the sky traveling from horizon to horizon like a satalite except it was red and traveling somewhat faster and moving side to side in a wave motion. not a fixed pattern but not exactly random either. it went much slower than a meteor. we stood up from our cots to better watch the skies. a short time later we saw a disc shaped object with red lights on its perimeter from a distance of about two miles. it seemed to be moving above the trees near the missouri river or following the river itself. not quite hovering, but moving slowly while tipping on its sides and demonstrating to us that this was something very unusual. we watched it head south until we lost it below the trees. we stayed alert and debated if we should go to lewis and clark monument, a park on the bluffs overlooking c.B and omaha. about 5 or 10 minutes after last seeing the object, it flew almost directly over our heads, about a block away, now going north and still just above treetop level. we lost site of it and decided to go ahead and drive to the park. on the way we were driving through big lake park and i was keeping watch. i saw the object coming in our direction, still at treetop level, except i had the eerie feeling that it was coming for us. we panicked. i wanted to hide under the train bridge near the tennis court and my girlfriend stopped the car about 50 yards short of the bridge. we ran to and under the bridge to hide. i've never experienced that kind of fear before or since. but, like a couple of prarie dogs we felt compelled to peek out and see more of this incredible object. so we did. it was hovering above a large cottonwood tree near the tennis court about 50 to 75 yards away from us. it was still dark out. the disc looked about 100 feet in diameter with large red rectangular lights flashing in sequence aroun its edge which seemed to be about 15 feet thick. as we watched, frozen with awe and fear it dipped its edge while hovering. one of the red light went out and in its place a beam of light shot out of it and shined directly at us. the next thing either of us remember is that it was now daylight and we were back in the car driving towards our original destination of lewis and clark monument. we called police and they said they had a report of something in missouri valley, ia. about 20 miles to the north. animals were behaving strangely. either they were oddly quiet or behaving wildly. when we drove back through big lake park ther were people there who said they saw nothing. i don't really know how much time we are talking about here. in 1974 i had never heard of the phenomenon of "missing time", but over the years i became well schooled with the term. we make no claims of abduction. dr. kasher of univ. of nebraska at omaha, after hearing my story referred me to a hypnotist. i never went. maybe out of fear. i was afraid to know anymore. to this day i feel i know enough. my girlfriend and i went home that morning and drew identical pictures and repeated identical stories. i've had no credibility ever since. you have to understand at the time i thought the world was coming to an end or something. in 1977 an article came out in popular mechanics about an incident that happened very near there involving a blob of molten metal falling 500 feet from an object similar in description to what we saw. jacqes vallee came to investigate that occurence. that is why i repeat my story and will always harbor these hazy memories and questions. in 2001 i filed a report with nicap, but i know that mufon is the proper agency for that now. i've never seen or experienced anything like that since. but i feel it in my gut every day.
content.summary: Myself and a friend saw a disc with large red rectangular lights flashing on-off in a clockwise manner as seen from below.It performed diff. manuvers, shined a light on us then we experienced missing time.

content.detailedDescription: Sunday afternoon 26th august 2007 family gathering in the garden, when suddenly both my daughter and niece shouted" there`s something moving in the sky, at that time we were in the conservatory and came running out to see what was happening as the children pointed up at the sky we then saw 5 perfectly shaped spheres solid looking and shining a distinct silver, there were 2 in front with 3 close behind. suddenly the one from the rear accelerated to the front of the formation to take point, this was sighted for a good few minutes before the formation disappeared into the distance,at the time very little high altitude cloud cover, blue sky. this was my first ever daylight sighting all my other observations of unexplained phenomena have been at dusk and night time. these objects left no vapour trail what so ever and no apparent sound unlike what you would hear from an high level bomber or other aircraft, just total silence.My borther in law thought they were ballons but ballons do not travel in that manner or indeed that quickly plus for one to out accelerate the others to take the lead of formation, what they were who knows but if i had to make a guess they were either highly classified military craft or indeed of another world of which the latter would probably fit the criteria. at exactly 7.00pm that evening on arriving back home we had a text from my niece saying that she had just witnessed a single object the same as the others on the same flight path moving very quickly in an easterly direction before going out of sight.We do not have any photos or such like as it was all to quick really but i hope someone else in great britain also witnessed this extraordinary event.I would be pleased to hear of this eye witness account.
content.summary: 5 objects in formation flying due east at 90 degrees, the rear object then accelerated to take the lead of the formation
